Posts.Content: Dec 31, 2009 05:12PM opie002 wrote: warrior...new to discussion boards, please bare with me!  I was stage 2b,w/lymphnode +(2 outa 10) and HER2+. my onc. dr. wants me to do a trial study. just wanted to know if there is anyone who had heard of or are doing the trial with herceptin and or bevacizumab along with chemo? I was diagnosed nov. 11th, had Lt.  breast mast on dec.8th, healing VERY well. I raise my glass of (arizona raspberry tea) and toast all my "pink" sisters........HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!!!!
Posts.Title: Stage II w/Lymph Node Involvement Warrior517 Moderators
